channel.title: How do you make shops and sell daggers their?
channel.description: How do you make a shop that sells daggers?

item.title: How do you make shops and sell daggers their?
item.dc:creator: @beaner1337 beaner1337
item.description:
@beaner1337 wrote:

step one: open up your shops.cfg

step two : put in your cords and shop id

step three: look for the item id

for example look at whats in myn

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 @red@Stuff_Shop 1 1 4151 10 1215 10 1231 10 1305 10 1377 10 1434 10 1704 10 4587 10 5698 10 3105 10 1333 10 1052 10 6568 10 3486 10 3483 10 3481 10 1127 20 1093 20 1079 20 1163 20 892 500 1050 10 1052 10 2581 5 2577 5 861 10 859 10 3842 10 3840 10 3844 10 2552 50 1712 50

then just look for the npc id: change to whatever person you have selling hope I helped

Read full topic
